summary: A ragtag group of youngsters band together after the American Civil War to form the Texas Rangers, a group charged with the dangerous, ruthless duty of cleaning up the West.
cast: James Van Der Beek|Rachael Leigh Cook|Ashton Kutcher|Dylan McDermott|Usher|Tom Skerritt|Randy Travis|Leonor Varela|Brian Martell|Alfred Molina|Billy Morton|Kate Newby|Robert Patrick|Gordon Michaels|Joe Renteria|Jon Abrahams|Bob Bancroft|Stephen Bridgewater|Jordan Brower|Anthony Crivello|Oded Fehr|Derek Flores|Breon Gorman|Eric Johnson|Matt Keeslar|Matthew Kennedy|Marco Leonardi|Brad Loree|David Millbern|William Prael|A. Alexandra Sanford|Jim Shield|Joe Spano|Vincent Spano|Jesse G. Thompson|Gareth Williams|Catherine Sutherland|James Coburn
title: Texas Rangers
